articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Lottery winner comes forward in New York
articles.description: 67-year-old Robert Bailey is splitting the nearly $688 million jackpot with Lerynne West of Iowa. Bailey plans to “take care of it for the next generation” of his family.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Soon you’ll be able to take flight on a hoverbike — for a price
articles.description: Hoversurf, a California-based company, says it’s delivering hoverbikes next year. They’re powered by four propellers, go about 45 miles an hour at 16 feet above the ground, and cost $150,000.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Family offers warning to travelers after son killed on trip to Mexico
articles.description: 27-year-old Taylor Meyer was stabbed to death while visiting Playa del Carmen for a friend’s birthday. Last year Mexico welcomed nearly 40 million foreign visitors and recorded its highest homicide rate on record.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Mattis visits troops at U.S.-Mexico line
articles.description: Secretary Mattis says the nearly 6000 troops are mostly unarmed and won’t apprehend the caravan of migrants and refugees who are still one week away from Tijuana.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Trump rolls out most sweeping prison reform agreement in decades
articles.description: If the deal passes, it would loosen restrictions on certain federal mandatory minimum sentences and extend a 2010 law that could help federal drug offenders serving disproportionately long sentences.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Suspected serial killer confessed to more than 90 murders, prosecutors say
articles.description: 78-year-old Samuel Little is serving three life sentences for strangling three women in the Los Angeles-area in the late 1980s. He has allegedly confessed to dozens of murders, which if true would make him one of the deadliest serial killers in U.S. history.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Parkland mass shooting suspect allegedly attacks jail guard
articles.description: According to an affidavit, the suspect hit a deputy guarding him repeatedly, and grabbed the deputy’s taser-like device, before the deputy got it back. Investigators say the whole incident was recorded on a closed-circuit camera.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: New concerns over toxic smoke as California wildfire death toll rises
articles.description: Residents in Southern California fear they have been breathing toxic smoke for days after fire scorched parts of the Santa Susana Field Lab were believed to have released toxic chemicals.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Two killed when tour bus overturns along icy highway in winter blast
articles.description: Dangerous icy conditions sent a tour bus sliding off an overpass bridge in Mississippi, killing two and leaving dozens injured. This is part of the first major winter blast expected to hit the South, Midwest, and Northeast.

articles.description: Florida police say they are grateful for an anonymous tip that led to the arrest of a man who was allegedly manufacturing "Mother of Satan," a volatile chemical that had the potential of blowing up a neighborhood block. WESH's Gail Paschall-Brown reports.

articles.title: Family of four arrested for murdering Ohio family on pot farm
